name: All in Pairs
description:
A warehouse worker's day can't be boring. Every day things are scattered on the table in front of you.

Stack items in pairs in the designated container in this challenging top-down puzzle game.
Time for sorting is strictly limited and if you do not have time, the level will start again.
Sort through a pile of things lying in a mess and put them in pairs. Many things are so similar to each other and you can get confused. The puzzle perfectly tests attentiveness and reaction.

Game Features:
- Drag&Drop Physics
- Challenging Puzzles
- Low Poly Graphics
